Reference

Manipulating sample_data

Functions for modifying and augmenting the sample data within phyloseq objects: readable and pipe-able.

ps_select()

Select phyloseq sample_data using dplyr::select syntax

ps_filter()

Filter phyloseq samples by sample_data variables

ps_mutate()

Modify or compute new sample_data in phyloseq object

ps_join()

Join a dataframe to phyloseq sample data

ps_arrange()

Arrange samples in phyloseq by sample_data variables or taxon abundance

ps_seriate()

Arrange samples in a phyloseq by microbiome similarity

ps_reorder()

Set order of samples in phyloseq object

ps_dedupe()

De-duplicate phyloseq samples

ps_drop_incomplete()

Deselect phyloseq samples with sample_data missings

ps_otu2samdat()

Copy phyloseq otu_table data to sample_data

Manipulating taxa

Functions for editing or working with the taxonomic information contained within phyloseq objects.

tax_fill_unknowns()

Deprecated, use tax_fix

tax_prepend_ranks()

Add rank prefixes to phyloseq tax_table values

tax_filter()

Filter rare and/or low abundance taxa from a phyloseq object

tax_agg()

Aggregate taxa and create ps_extra

tax_transform()

Transform taxa in phyloseq object and record transformation

tax_scale()

Mean-center and SD-scale taxa in phyloseq

tax_select()

Subset phyloseq object by (partial) taxa names

tax_name()

Set unique taxa_names for phyloseq object

Ordination and related methods

Functions for assessing and visualising overall microbiota composition and its associations with phyloseq sample data variables.

dist_calc()

Calculate distances between pairs of samples in phyloseq object

dist_permanova()

Calculate PERMANOVA after dist_calc()

dist_bdisp()

Wrapper for vegan::betadisper()

ord_calc()

Ordinate samples (arrange by similarity in multiple dimensions)

ord_plot()

Customisable ggplot ordination (using ord_calc result)

ord_plot_iris()

Circular compositional barplot sorted by ordination angle

ord_explore()

Interactively explore compositions of ordinated samples

ps_get() dist_get() ord_get() info_get() perm_get() bdisp_get() otu_get() samdat_tbl()

Extract elements from ps_extra class

Taxon models and tree visualisations

Functions for modelling and visualising associations between individual microbes and phyloseq sample data variables.

tax_model() taxatree_models()

Statistical modelling for individual taxa in a phyloseq

taxatree_plots() taxatree_plotkey()

Plot taxonomic stats on a ggraph tree (and draw key)

More plotting functions

Annotated heatmaps and stacked barcharts

comp_heatmap()

Heatmap of taxonomic composition across samples

cor_heatmap()

Microbe-to-sample-data correlation heatmap

tax_anno() anno_prev() anno_abund() var_anno() anno_var_hist() anno_var_box()

Heatmap annotations helpers

comp_barplot()

Plot (grouped and ordered) compositional barplots

Other functions

Helpful funs, but less interesting…

distinct_palette()

Arbitrary expansion of the "Paired" colorbrewer palette

phyloseq_validate()

Check for (and fix) common problems with phyloseq objects

Contents
